overview: Spectacularly ass-blessed blonde Anikka Albrite, AVN's Female Performer Of The Year and a partner in the BAM Visions production company, presents her directing debut: Anikka's Bootycise is a visually sumptuous all-girl marathon (over four hours) in which the charismatic performer/director coaches hot-assed natural beauties through sphincter-expanding workouts and torrid lesbian lovemaking.
title: Anikka's Bootycise
